thread.title: Jason Kelce's wife Kylie reveals 'most romantic thing' that ex-Eagles star said to her
thread.title_full: Jason Kelce's wife Kylie reveals 'most romantic thing' that ex-Eagles star said to her

author: Shanu Singh
title: Jason Kelce's wife Kylie reveals 'most romantic thing' that ex-Eagles star said to her
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } Follow Us Share 0 Discuss 0 Discuss What's your opinion? Jason Kelce’s wife Kylie reveals ‘most romantic thing’ that ex-Eagles star said to her Discuss Now Jason Kelce’s wife Kylie reveals ‘most romantic thing’ that ex-Eagles star said to her (Credits: Getty) Jason Kelce and his wife Kylie have been married for six years, but it wasn't until recently that the podcaster talked about the 'most romantic thing' the ex-Eagles star said to her. Kylie Kelce's confession came on her "Not Gonna Lie" podcast.
In an exclusive episode of the NGL podcast on Monday, Kylie Kelce recalled a "romantic" Christmas tradition that she has carried out with her husband Jason Kelce . Recalling the tradition and explaining how it was the “most romantic thing” that the retired NFL star said, Kylie said:
"One tradition outside of our kids that Jason and I did quite some time ago is we went on our first trip together as a couple and Jason had discussed we should try and get an ornament how great would it be if we eventually ended up with a tree covered in ornaments from all the places that we've been together. Which might have been one of the most romantic things he's ever said." Trending •

"The only issue is that we went through the whole trip and forgot to look for Christmas ornaments," Kylie further added. (1:20). "So naturally when we were in the airport, about to be on our way home, we had to stop into the souvenir shop that's in the airport. The only thing that they had were keychains so we committed to the bit and stuck with it. Now we have a Christmas tree covered in keychains." Apart from having a romantic Christmas tradition with her husband, Jason Kelce, Kylie also has a unique tradition with her kids, which the podcaster discussed during the same episode.
Jason Kelce's wife Kylie revealed Christmas tradition with daughters Jason Kelce and his wife Kylie are parents to three kids and are expecting their fourth child. Jason and Kylie share a special Christmas tradition with their daughters, where instead of buying the Christmas tree from the marketplace, the Kelce family goes out and gets it from their farm.
Talking about the adorable tradition during the same exclusive podcast episode, Kylie Kelce said.
"We have for the last couple years uh cut down our Christmas tree we go to a lovely Farm nearby our Safa farms and cut down," Kylie said. "We go out into the field on the tractor and we cut down our Christmas tree. The girls absolutely love it." "We also have uh slowly been increasing the number of decorations that are inside of our house. We have to be mindful of what we choose and how high up we do them because kids and a lot of holiday decorations are breakable," she concluded. (0:14) Before talking about her Christmas tradition, Kylie Kelce shared her "weird" experience running the "Not Gonna Lie" podcast in the latest episode of the "New Heights" podcast by Travis and Jason Kelce.
